Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something. - Plato Read More Plato: http://t.co/ijOo5JtJh0
@ververthesecret The answer is different for every one, every situation. Neither school of thought addresses that forgiveness is never easy!
@expat_46 There is another school of thought which says if you don't forgive, the burden stays within your heart and languishes there.

Forgiveness is a funny thing. It warms the heart and cools the sting. - William Arthur Ward #easterquote
http://t.co/nGdKHo3KPy
Enjoy and share more Easter quotes here: http://t.co/XltIPYveWF
Enjoy today's featured photo quote by Martin Luther... and have a Happy Easter! http://t.co/UNJmCUfJkw
Our Lord has written the promise of resurrection, not in books alone, but in every leaf in springtime. - Martin Luther #easterquote

http://t.co/IRiGEqq7vL
